item.title: Need Help with ForkLift Animation
item.author: invalid@example.com (billy240clint@hotmail)
item.dc:creator: billy240clint@hotmail
item.content:encoded:
Hey I am making a ForkLift and i would like for it to be able to lift objects as it is moving, ect. I would like for it to be true to life, being able to move the forks up and down, foward and backwards, but i dont know how to go about scripting that. I need to know the following items or where the best place to get the information.

1. Attaching objects with animations to the forklift
2. Make the arrow keys active the animations of the forks moving
3. The functions that I need so that...

Need Help with ForkLift Animation

item.title: Welcome to the new Screen forum
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mychaeel)
item.dc:creator: Mychaeel
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the new forum of the Screen website. In case you never heard about the Screen Component before, have a look at What are Screens? page and the Showcase section. Screens basically are a very versatile way to create dynamic textures---even dynamic textures that reflect the current game status or that display information...

Welcome to the new Screen forum

item.title: MessageTextureClient + ut2k3 ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Chrasher)
item.dc:creator: Chrasher
item.content:encoded:
Have you got MessageTextureClient to work in ut2k3 too Mychaeel?

Have played around pretty much with it and but cant get it to work. The scriptedtexture just change to a black texture and then it doesnt happend anything more.

Just checked out how its done in UT the maps and its seems to be same as in my map but still no Message

item.title: Security Camera
item.author: invalid@example.com (akn81)
item.dc:creator: akn81
item.content:encoded: Can Screen be adapted to show a live feed from a camera/bot?

item.title: Flag Texture Screen?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sup_W)
item.dc:creator: Sup_W
item.content:encoded:
Hi Mychaeel,
Hope you still visit these forums regularly.
I'm wondering if it would be possible to attach a screen to a flag texture.
I've already used custom flag textures and I'm wondering if there's a way to add something like a camera to it. So if your flag has been taken you'd beable to see where your flag is by looking at the opposing teams flag.

item.title: Triggering Textures?
item.author: invalid@example.com (jtomlinson)
item.dc:creator: jtomlinson
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Wondering if you could help with with switching through textures upon hitting a button. I have downloaded and setup the screen modification and was hoping someone could lay out a few steps for me.

Im wanting to first change some already installed textures into scripted textures and then be able to switch through a few while in the game via a trigger.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks, James

item.title: screen textures on models
item.author: invalid@example.com (elffum)
item.dc:creator: elffum
item.content:encoded: just curious, would the cool map function work as a texture on a model? being able to carry around a map would be cool although i suppose you would have to have a map texture for each map... still, would it be possible?

item.title: Server Info Displayed Using Screens ??
item.author: invalid@example.com ([MPZ]SimonG(UK))
item.dc:creator: [MPZ]SimonG(UK)
item.content:encoded:
Hi Guys

Firstly, I'd like to say how impressive the Screens mod is - A classpeice of work indeed

I'm hoping to use the mod in hopefully unique way in a project that we're getting off the ground here at MPZ, but I was wondering if it's possible to do the following with the Mod ?

Display the server details of a UT server at a specific IP address on the internet ?

If the answer is yes, we'd like to be able to pull the following info down from the server, and display it in...

Server Info Displayed Using Screens ??

item.title: Idea
item.author: invalid@example.com (Underscore)
item.dc:creator: Underscore
item.content:encoded:
I don't know if it's been thought of before, but here's my idea:

How about having some special players with a screen on their backs, which shows their name? Or frags? Or anything else? .

item.title: RAVE: you're not going to like this...
item.author: invalid@example.com (tarquin)
item.dc:creator: tarquin
item.content:encoded:
I noticed a new problem with the ScreenMap in my map when I played it on the Mac. Freya][ has the same problem.
This hadn't and doesn't happen on the PC so my conclusion is that it's caused by the RAVE renderer.

The problem is this: the transparency in the ScreenMap's player icons doesn't work.
There may be other transparency issues but I don't have any suitable test material.
It's very noticeable on Pressurized because the masked colour I used is pink (... go figure why...).
In the...

RAVE: you're not going to like this...

item.title: New Screen actor icons
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mychaeel)

item.content:encoded:
I'm currently working on replacement icons for the Screen-related actors... just got tired of those llama heads (or vulture heads? Or what?).

First one, for the Screen actor itself:



What do you think?

item.title: UM, slight problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bonecrusher)
item.dc:creator: Bonecrusher
item.content:encoded: How comes sometimes when I'm in a map that has screens with the UTJB news on it, it says DOH! The page you were looking for could not be found. Is that a UTJB website problem or a screens problem?

item.title: Just thought I'd drop by
item.author: invalid@example.com (Daikiki)
item.dc:creator: Daikiki
item.content:encoded:
. . . .and say 'Hi'. Seemd the decent thing to do.

/me looks around a bit, his hands in his pockets.

I like what you've done with the place. Interesting. . .plants.

/me whistles a tuneless tune.

Well, thanks for having me over. Oh my! Is that the time. Gotta run.

Dai
